class.name: Phaser.Plugin

parameters.name: game
parameters.help: A reference to the currently running game.

parameters.name: parent
parameters.help: The object that owns this plugin, usually Phaser.PluginManager.

class.help: This is a base Plugin template to use for any Phaser plugin development.

public.name: destroy
public.help: Clear down this Plugin and null out references

public.name: postRender
public.help: Post-render is called after the Game Renderer and State.render have run.\nIt is only called if visible is set to true.

public.name: preUpdate
public.help: Pre-update is called at the very start of the update cycle, before any other subsystems have been updated (including Physics).\nIt is only called if active is set to true.

public.name: render
public.help: Render is called right after the Game Renderer completes, but before the State.render.\nIt is only called if visible is set to true.

public.name: update
public.help: Update is called after all the core subsystems (Input, Tweens, Sound, etc) and the State have updated, but before the render.\nIt is only called if active is set to true.

public.name: active
public.inlineHelp: A Plugin with active=true has its preUpdate and update methods called by the parent, otherwise they are skipped.

public.name: game
public.inlineHelp: A reference to the currently running game.

public.name: hasPostRender
public.inlineHelp: A flag to indicate if this plugin has a postRender method.

public.name: hasPostUpdate
public.inlineHelp: A flag to indicate if this plugin has a postUpdate method.

public.name: hasPreUpdate
public.inlineHelp: A flag to indicate if this plugin has a preUpdate method.

public.name: hasRender
public.inlineHelp: A flag to indicate if this plugin has a render method.

public.name: hasUpdate
public.inlineHelp: A flag to indicate if this plugin has an update method.

public.name: parent
public.inlineHelp: The parent of this plugin. If added to the PluginManager the parent will be set to that, otherwise it will be null.

public.name: visible
public.inlineHelp: A Plugin with visible=true has its render and postRender methods called by the parent, otherwise they are skipped.
